abstract: Former British Prime Min David Cameron, who resigned following national referendum on withdrawal from European Union, accepts symbolic appointment as Crown Steward and Bailiff of Manor of Northstead; move is necessary step in facilitating his legal resignation from seat in House of Commons.
lead_paragraph: The former British prime minister said he is leaving the House of Commons because his continued presence would be a distraction to the new government.
snippet: The former British prime minister said he is leaving the House of Commons because his continued presence would be a distraction to the new government....

headline.main: David Cameron Steps Down From His Seat in British Parliament
headline.print_headline: David Cameron Makes His Own Exit, Giving Up His Seat in Britain’s Parliament
